raw_text: COREA – MONICA DOREEN (Former Teacher of Uva College,​ Badulla). Beloved wife of Vernon (Radio Ceylon /​ SLBC and BBC Broadcaster),​ everloving mother of Ivan,​ Vernon Jr. and Ouida,​ mother-in-law of Fidelma and Praveen,​ passed away peacefully on the 13th of November in New Malden,​ Surrey,​ UK,​ aged 94. She rests in the Arms of Christ Jesus-to rise in glory.074794
